document.full_text: u.s. officials said they are looking into why two passenger planes were unable to communicate with the air traffic control tower at reagan washington national airport before landing early on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. probing why washington airport tower went silent
lines_and_colors: u.s. officials said they are looking into why two passenger planes were unable to communicate with the air traffic control tower at reagan washington national airport before landing early on wednesday.
